subject: p11413236
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to and CT chest from. Heart size and mediastinum are stable in this patient after median sternotomy and CABG. Lungs are essentially clear except for minimal atelectasis at the left lower lung, unchanged since. No definitive evidence of aspiration demonstrated. Calcified mediastinal lymph nodes are seen. Port-A-Cath catheter tip is at the level of mid low SVC.
